page.title: 18INVERECK CARAVAN PARK-INFO
page.content: Invereck Caravan Park occupies {8} acres.There are 6 permanent caravans and{45 caravans}can fit into the park. The busiest season is Cowal Games and the other busy times are July and August. On season it costs up to{Â£13}and off season it only costs{Â£8}for 3 nights The visitors come mostly from South England.Sometimes they come from France or Germamy. Campers can go but it does not cost as much for them.It costs {Â£3}for 4 people in a big tent.It costs {30p}for each extra person. They do not have facilities for disabled people but if they can get up the steps they can stay in a caravan owned by the park. There are showers,a laundry and a freezer.Pets can go but they have to be on a lead.
